description: --- language: en thumbnail: license: apache-2.0 --- ## MobileBERT: a Compact Task-Agnostic BERT for Resource-Limited Devices MobileBERT is a thin version of BERT_LARGE, while equipped with bottleneck structures and a carefully designed balance between self-attentions and feed-forward networks. This checkpoint is the original MobileBert Optimized Uncased English: uncased_L-24_H-128_B-512_A-4_F-4_OPT checkpoint. ## How to use MobileBERT in
model_explanation_gemini: MobileBERT is a compact, task-agnostic version of BERT_LARGE designed for resource-limited devices, featuring bottleneck structures and optimized self-attention-to-feed-forward network balance.
